description: Lists all the event buses in your account, including the default event bus, custom event buses, and partner event buses.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token returned by a previous call, which you can use to retrieve the next set of results. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Using an expired pagination token results in an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the event bus.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event bus.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The permissions policy of the event bus, describing which other Amazon Web Services accounts can write events to this event bus.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the event bus was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time the event bus was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating there are more results available. If there are no more results, no token is included in the response.
